name: Lemon Ricotta Cheesecake

ingredients.name: quantity classic lemon curd
ingredients.original_string: 1/2 quantity Classic Lemon Curd or 3/4 cup (240g) store-bought lemon curd, chilled

ingredients.name: quantity ricotta cheesecake base and filling
ingredients.original_string: 1 quantity Ricotta Cheesecake base and filling, baked and chilled

instructions: Spread the lemon curd over the cheesecake to serve.
